name: Admire Vega (umamusume)
description:
LoRA of Admire Vega (umamusume)

All of my works is free. If you'd like to support me, feel free to buy me a coffee. 👍

Recommend options

  • LoRA weight 0.7~1.0

  • Trigger words

    • base

      • admire vega \(umamusume\)

    • Racing competition clothes :

      • white necktie, skirt, long sleeves, white footwear, thigh strap, black pantyhose, boots, shirt, puffy sleeves, pleated skirt, buttons, corset, capelet, fingerless gloves, black gloves, mismatched footwear

      • (optional) skirt -> white skirt,

    • Tracen school uniform :

      • tracen school uniform, purple shirt, white skirt, puffy short sleeves, sailor collar, bowtie, pleated skirt, sailor shirt, miniskirt, zettai ryouiki, white thighhighs

    • Casual clothes:

      • pants, long sleeves, blue sweater, turtleneck sweater, ribbed sweater, jeans, jewelry, casual, necklace

      • (optional) object hug, pillow, bed sheet

Use animefull based model

  • Settings

    • DPM++ Series(SDE Karras, 2M Karras, etc.)

    • about 20 steps, CFG scale 3.5~6.5

    • kl-f8-anime2.vae

    • CLIP skip = 1

    • If using highres

      • Latent series

      • Denoising strength 0.50~0.65

LoRA training info

  • trained on sd-scripts by kohya_ss. Thank you a lot!

  • based on Animefull-pruned

  • 154 images of fine motion

    • 4x low quality 46 images

    • 8x medium quality 53 images

    • 16x high quality 55 images

    • => 1 epoch = 1488 images

  • replaced character feature tags with admire vega \(umamusume\)

    • horse girl, horse tail, brown hair, purple eyes, etc.

  • using aspect ratio bucketing

  • resolution : 768x768

  • rank=alpha=16

  • using dadaptation

  • batch size = 4, 7 epochs trained

  • clip skip = 1

This LoRA may be compatible with animefull-based models (ex. AbyssOrangeMix Series...)

All uploaded images are generated by AOM3A1
